remarks: Utility theorem for converting a functional to a vector of the dual space in order to use standard vector theorems.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
ldualelvbase.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualelvbase.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualelvbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` D ) $.
ldualelvbase.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
ldualelvbase.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualelvbase $p |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
